emoji_style.title: Emoji Style
emoji_style.subtitle: Choose the style of emojis you prefer

fallback_emoji_style.title: Fallback Emoji Style
fallback_emoji_style.subtitle: Choose the style of emojis you prefer, if your first pick isn't available

display_char.title: Display System Emoji
display_char.subtitle: If yes, emojis in the search menu will appear to the right of their names, and will be rendered by the system's font.

skin_tone.title: Skin Tone
skin_tone.subtitle: Choose the skin tone for your emojis
